channel.title: 2DScape ## Fantura
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://files.yey.nu/5693895021/framepart1.bmp[/img]
Making a 2-dimensional version of runescape! I made this thread for criticism and
Website(requested): [url=http://www.morot4.webs.com]www.morot4.webs.com[/url] haha ik no domain D: 0.9 Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dcbt6guuebv0gfg]http://www.mediafire.com/?dcbt6guuebv0gfg[/url]
[img]http://files.yey.nu/5693895021/fanturaicon.bmp[/img]
The server is currently in alpha v.0.9. and has been developed for half a year now. The server currently has following skills:
[table] [tr] [td]1. Smithing 2. Woodcutting 3. Fishing 4. Mining 5. Cooking[/td] [/tr] [/table]
The server is made in Visual Basic 6(not java) and is built from the open source engine "Eclipse Origins." by Robin Perris. The client AND server are heavily modified to fit a retro 2D rs2 remake with the old quests etc.
What needs to be done;
*Proper range system. *Crafting. *Running and a more developed boss system. *Extended map and areas to roam.
[img]http://files.yey.nu/5693895021/guy1.bmp[/img] [img]http://files.yey.nu/5693895021/guy2.bmp[/img]
Every update i make, i'll post in this log beginning with 0.9.
[img]http://files.yey.nu/7746950412/o.bmp[/img][img]http://files.yey.nu/7746950412/dot.bmp[/img][img]http://files.yey.nu/7746950412/9.bmp[/img]
Added three quests and a new town. Quests;
Royal Crisis Summer's Heat Bandit's Rampage
_____________________________________________________________________
Some youtube videos:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_vy26l4MNA[/youtube]
[img]http://files.yey.nu/5693895021/framepart2.bmp[/img]

item.title: 2DScape ## Fantura
item.dc:creator: @lurviq lurviq
item.description:
@lurviq wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:27, topic:448186”]Well done you readded it.

Also, why did you create a RS2 server advertisement post for this? This is not RS2, so it doesn’t belong in any of the RS2 boards (including development, which is where I moved this from)

So if you do create new threads for this for some reason, either this section or general discussion please.[/quote]

My bad, sorry. But please get your facts straight before assuming things.

Read full topic

item.title: 2DScape ## Fantura
item.dc:creator: @lurviq lurviq
item.description:
@lurviq wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:25, topic:448186”]Why is this here? This section is for RS2 Server development. I’ll move it to general programming for now. It may be moved to the game development community, but I forgot if we allow Game Maker games there, so I’ll have to confirm with Taharok.

But removing the credits in the eclipse origin game engine was a pretty dick move.[/quote]

Type “/credits” in-game, dummy.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Why is this here? This section is for RS2 Server development. I’ll move it to general programming for now. It may be moved to the game development community, but I forgot if we allow Game Maker games there, so I’ll have to confirm with Taharok.

But removing the credits in the eclipse origin game engine was a pretty dick move.

item.title: 2DScape ## Fantura
item.dc:creator: @lurviq lurviq
item.description:
@lurviq wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:18, topic:448186”]Lurviq, why do you take full credits for this, as if you made it? The only thing you did is add shitty graphics to an open source 2d VB6 game engine “Eclipse Origins”. You even removed the credits of the creator of the engine. I lol’d at heavily modified. You didn’t even change the GUI properly.
Go fuck yourself with a cucumber.[/quote]

Someone, i’ve fixed all known RTE Bugs, i’ve made both the client flawlessly stable and added quests etc and many more functions.
If you downloaded the client you WOULD know that i credited Robin(lead developer of EO) in the credits.

Also, it’s not like the first thing i do is to change the GUI to make it look like i did everything myself, the most important thing for me is to create a retro runescape server which everyone can enjoy. i WOULD give half my server modules just to prove you wrong.
I’m also flattered that you would spend your time ranting about how i ‘stole the code’ and ‘how i made this in a day’
sure, i would be able to make hundreds of maps, graphic files, tiles, quests and other customly coded systems in a day.

My server is awesome, get over it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“dawwn, post:19, topic:448186”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=551077.msg4041342#msg4041342 date=1341672067]
Lurviq, why do you take full credits for this, as if you made it? The only thing you did is add shitty graphics to an open source 2d VB6 game engine “Eclipse Origins”. You even removed the credits of the creator of the engine. I lol’d at heavily modified. You didn’t even change the GUI properly.
Go fuck yourself with a cucumber.
[/quote]

True, but the part that you get very angry is confusing; as if you did the work and got no credit.[/quote]the anger is just another part of ‘dickhead syndrome’ of which someone2 seems to be suffering from. the problem is common around here unfortunately.

Read full topic
